hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Sufyan:That Heraclius sent for him and said, "What did he, i.e. the Prophet (ﷺ) order you?" I replied, "He orders us to offer prayers; to give alms; to be chaste; and to keep good relations with our relatives

chapter.ara-name: باب صِلَةِ الْمَرْأَةِ أُمَّهَا وَلَهَا زَوْجٌ
chapter.eng-name: Kindness by a lady who has a husband, to her mother
